A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Best Star Wars yet!  

Yes\, I said it.  And I'm old enough to have seen them all in theaters.  

Certainly deserves some Oscar bids.  Not only is it a great sci fi movie\, it is just a great movie.  Still recovering from the emotional roller coaster.

Kyle Ren is everything I believe Lucus wanted in Vader but he didn't have the script or the actor to pull it off in the prequels.

And Luke....wow\, I didn't realize that Mark Hamill was actually a good actor until last night.
